Persistence in factor-based supervised learning models
================
This page contains research material on the topic of using long term returns in machine learning models for factor investing.

- The notebook for the <a href="files/predictions_share.nb.html" target="_blank">**baseline results**</a>.
- The <a href="https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=3588261" target="_blank">**paper**</a>.
